title: ‘Cross Is Coming, but When? Van der Poel, Vos, Van Aert Thread Needle between Multi-Discipline Ambition
content:
European cyclocross season has started, but where are the sports biggest stars? 'We also have to consider preparing for the road'

Read the full article at ‘Cross Is Coming, but When? Van der Poel, Vos, Van Aert Thread Needle between Multi-Discipline Ambition on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
